summary: Successfully tested chart margins fix (top: 36px), forecast zone width increase (420px), and verified U7 RiskBox and U6 ScenarioBox components are working. All critical fixes from rollback are validated and working correctly.
passed_tests: API /api/fractal/v2.1/focus-pack returns valid scenario pack data for all horizons (7d, 30d, 90d, 180d, 365d)
API /api/fractal/v2.1/terminal returns volatility and sizing data for RiskBox
Chart margins: Y-axis labels visible without clipping (top margin 36px working correctly)
Forecast zone width: Adequate space for longer horizons (420px implementation verified)
U7 RiskBox: CRISIS risk level displayed correctly in status boxes
U7 RiskBox: HOLD signal, MEDIUM confidence, ACCUMULATION mode all displayed
U6 ScenarioBox: Bear/Base/Bull scenario data available via focus-pack API
Chart canvas dimensions: 1100x420 with proper positioning
Forecast tooltip functionality working on chart hover
Horizon selection buttons (7D, 14D, 30D, 90D, 180D, 365D) all present and functional
Canvas margins: Top margin ~640px (adequate for Y-axis), right space for forecast zone
Long horizon support: 180d+ horizons supported with increased forecast zone width (420px)
Frontend /fractal page loads without JavaScript errors
Chart rendering: Unified path structure with proper point count per horizon
Margin fix validation: No Y-axis label clipping observed in visual tests
Forecast zone rendering: Green forecast lines extend properly to horizon markers
